text: It is an honor to be recognized for this! I am grateful to my team and the big team back @FERC who enable this good work to move forward. Thank you @CleanEnergyGrid and @CleanEnergyBA.

quotedTweet.text:
CEBA was proud to sponsor @CleanEnergyGrid's recent Transmission Champions event at the Library of Congress.

@DC_Kyle, CEBA‚Äôs Senior Director of Federal Affairs, introduced Commissioner @RosnerFERC of @FERC as a 2026 Transmission Champion, recognizing his leadership in advancing smart, cost-effective transmission solutions.

CEBA commends his bipartisan efforts to help ensure reliable, affordable electricity for all consumers. As transmission becomes increasingly critical to powering the modern energy system, Commissioner Rosner‚Äôs work exemplifies the collaboration and forward-thinking leadership needed to navigate surging demand growth and worsening weather events.

We congratulate all the honorees and are proud to support their efforts to strengthen the nation‚Äôs transmission system.

text: Reflecting on 2025 progress and my 2026 priorities @FERC: interconnection automation, transmission planning, connect large loads rapidly while protecting households, faster permitting, improving reliability, and smart load forecasting. Read more here: https://t.co/R4JLodXz7T

Big win with a 5-0 Commission vote to create flexible co-location options the PJM region can deploy to meet growing energy demand while protecting consumers.¬†Great to work with my colleagues on this commonsense outcome.¬†Click for details & explanation: https://t.co/YlvFohCdvj

Congratulations to @FERC Chairman Laura Swett! It‚Äôs an honor to serve with you. I‚Äôm excited to work together to ensure affordable and reliable energy for all consumers and accomplish big things for our country.

text: I am excited to work with my colleagues on Secretary Wright‚Äôs proposal.  Getting large load interconnection right is a generational opportunity that‚Äôs key to winning the AI race, reshoring American manufacturing, and keeping electricity reliable and affordable for everyone.

There is broad bipartisan support for FERC taking action soon on these issues, and I appreciate the @ENERGY Secretary turning to @FERC to do so.

Congratulations to Laura Swett and David LaCerte @LaCerteDA on your confirmation by the U.S. Senate. I look forward to serving with you @FERC!

Toured the Catawba Nuclear Station in York, SC today. The scale of the facility‚Äîwhich generates electricity to power 1.4 million homes‚Äîwas impressive as was the professionalism of the team running the plant. Thank you Harry Sideris and the @DukeEnergy team for hosting. https://t.co/Y2cScvVamq

Great @FERC April 2025 Open Meeting today. We issued an important order to speed interconnection in @NewYorkISO, we heard a FERC staff presentation on winter reliability, and received a @NERC_Official update on large load reliability.
